id.description:
The ID of this component, used to identify dash components
in callbacks. The ID needs to be unique across all of the
components in an app.

fullscreen_style.description: Defines CSS styles for the container when fullscreen=True.

cover_style.description: Defines CSS styles for the container when fullscreen=False.

fullscreenClassName.description: Often used with CSS to style elements with common properties.

coverClassName.description: CSS class names to apply to the container when fullscreen=False.

color.description:
Sets the color of the Spinner. You can also specify any valid CSS color
of your choice (e.g. a hex code, a decimal code or a CSS color name).

If not specified will default to black.

spinnerCSS.description:
Defines additional CSS styles for the spinner itself. It's based on the
emotion css styles here: https://emotion.sh/docs/introduction

type.description:
The type of spinner. Options are:
- bar
- beat
- bounce
- circle
- climbingBox
- clip
- clock
- dot
- fade
- grid
- hash
- moon
- pacman
- propagate
- puff
- pulse
- ring
- rise
- rotate
- scale
- sync

speedMultiplier.description: The relative speed of the spinner

size.description:
The spinner size (in px) - not applicable for loaders of type:
- bar
- fade
- scale

height.description:
The spinner height (in px) - only applicable for loaders of type:
- bar
- fade
- scale

width.description:
The spinner width (in px) - only applicable for loaders of type:
- bar
- fade
- scale

radius.description:
The spinner radius (in px) - only applicable for loaders of type:
- fade
- scale

margin.description:
The spinner margin (in px) - only applicable for loaders of type:
- beat
- dot
- fade
- hash
- moon
- pacman
- pulse
- ring
- rise
- rotate
- scale
- sync

fullscreen.description:
Boolean that determines if the loading spinner will be displayed
full-screen or not.

debounce.description:
When using the spinner as a loading spinner, add a time delay (in ms) to
the spinner being removed to prevent flickering.

show_initially.description:
Whether the Spinner should show on app start-up before the loading state
has been determined. Default True.
